title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Fractal Analytics: A Game-Changer in the AI IPO Arena
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Reliance on AI is making health workers less capable
description: Use of artificial intelligence may decrease medic’s likelihood of spotting cancerous growths, study finds
content:
Relying on artificial intelligence could be making health workers less capable, a study has suggested.
It is the first research to assess “the phenomenon of deskilling” in medics who have been using AI.
The study followed health care workers in Polan... [3047 chars]

title: Microsoft Lures Meta's Talent Pool With Multimillion-Dollar Pay Packages As The AI War Heats Up: Report
description: Microsoft is aggressively targeting top AI talent from Meta by offering multimillion-dollar bonuses amid a $240 billion industry-wide surge in AI spending, intensifying the battle for supremacy in artificial intelligence.

title: Satellite images reveal conditions that contributed to 'catastrophic' season
description: Images from space and artificial intelligence can help detect areas prone to extreme wildfires, researchers suggest, after satellite photos showed dry parts of Manitoba ahead of its devastating wildfire season.
content: The use of images from space and artificial intelligence can help in detecting areas that may be prone to extreme wildfires, researchers suggest. A fire burns as fire crews continue to fight wildfires around Lac du Bonnet, Man., Thursday, May 15, 202... [3528 chars]

title: Perplexity AI offers Google $34.5 bn for Chrome browser
description: Perplexity AI offered Google on Tuesday $34.5 billion for its popular Chrome web browser, which the internet giant could potentially be forced to sell as part of antitrust proceedings.The potential of Chrome being weakened or spun off comes as rivals such as Microsoft, ChatGPT and Perplexity put generative artificial intelligence (AI) to work fetching information from the internet in response to user queries.
content:
A US judge is expected to decide soon whether to order Google to sell its globally popular Chrome browser to weaken the tech firm's dominance in online search (Brandon Bell) (Brandon Bell/GETTY IMAGES NORTH AMERICA/Getty Images via AFP)

title: How to beat AI-driven custom pricing
description: There are new concerns around how artificial intelligence might be used to set prices for products, such as airfare. It comes after Delta Airlines announced it was using AI to help adjust prices on some of its flights. Tim McPhillips takes a look at how to approach buying tickets and how all consumers can help guard themselves against AI-driven custom pricing.
content:
Tim McPhillips:
You may have heard that Delta is using artificial intelligence to help set some airfare prices.
That sparked fears that the airline could create a custom price for you, using your data to find how much you would be willing to pay for ... [1298 chars]
